title: Riot doing nothing about our complaints.
body: This game gets boring day by day, no balance. so many feeders and toxic players. No point to complain anymore LOL doing nothing about just waste of time.  Just unfair game.  Disappointing ...  Thay to busy with tournaments and streaming the games. they big now but they forget who got them there, we, the players.  My prediction. this game one-day very soon will go down so fast, they won't know how it happened, but it happens where it stated, from us, the players.  It sucks, I really did like this game before...  Time to search for a game that makes it fair for the players...
